overview: Sometimes it's nice to cut to the chase. Fuck conversation. Fuck getting to know each other. You just want to satisfy your carnal itch and get the fuck out. Don't start talking to me. I don't want your conversation. I don't want to hear your voice. Just Shut Up and Fuck Me! The next time you think you need to talk or a nice cuddle to make yourself feel good... don't! Just shut up and fuck me.
title: Shut Up and Fuck Me!
